name: Spearit Bear – “Re-Up” Music NFT
description:
This NFT comes with a downloadable file of Spearit Bear's song "Re-Up" Purchase of this NFT transfers ownership of the digital file and image, not the right to ownership of the music itself. Commercial use of the image or the music file, aside from the resale of this NFT, must be requested and approved by Spearit Bear beforehand. This song was first released on streaming platforms in 2021 but is now exclusively available here.
The original beat for this song was created by L3miss
This song was written to give pride to those who use cannabis and have been shamed for doing so as well as to speak on some of the injustice that happens because of the archaic laws that still exist around it.
This music NFT qualifies as one that can be collected to add to the 5 total needed for a collector to be considered a 'Distributor' and receive monthly Distributor pool payments from secondary sale royalties. More info at spearitbear.com/nfts
